code: import React from'react';import'./Toolbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Toolbar=_ref=>{let{search,onSearchChange,colorFilter,onColorFilterChange,sortOrder,onSortChange}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"toolbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\u041F\u043E\u0438\u0441\u043A \u0437\u0430\u043C\u0435\u0442\u043E\u043A...",value:search,onChange:e=>onSearchChange(e.target.value),className:"search-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:colorFilter,onChange:e=>onColorFilterChange(e.target.value),className:"filter-select",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"all",children:"\u0412\u0441\u0435 \u0446\u0432\u0435\u0442\u0430"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"yellow",children:"\u0416\u0435\u043B\u0442\u044B\u0435"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"blue",children:"\u0413\u043E\u043B\u0443\u0431\u044B\u0435"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"pink",children:"\u0420\u043E\u0437\u043E\u0432\u044B\u0435"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"green",children:"\u0417\u0435\u043B\u0435\u043D\u044B\u0435"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onSortChange(sortOrder==='newest'?'oldest':'newest'),className:"sort-button",children:sortOrder==='newest'?'Сначала новые ▼':'Сначала старые ▲'})]});};export default Toolbar;
